entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Flurries beginning overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
